document_data.name: Ruldel
document_data.mainbody:
{{quote|''Zhentil Keep? Twill be a pleasure, Sir Dwarf, to turn them back.''|'''Ruldel''', guardcaptain of [[Thundarlun]] in the late {{yearlinkName|1357}}}}

'''Ruldel''' was a [[Cormyte]] soldier in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], part of the Eastern [[Stonelands]] Company.
document_data.Appearance: He had a hard face and a gray moustache.
document_data.Personality: He was eager to fight the Zhents.
document_data.History: Ruldel was part of the guard on [[Thundarlun]] in late {{yearlink|1357}} when [[Shandril Shessair]]'s party arrived at the town. While she was being interrogated as a traveler, the guard was attacked by [[Zhentilar]] forces in pursuit of the girl; Ruldel was quickly slain.
